languages.text: {n}Мститель заметно теряет хладнокровие.{/n} "Признайся: ты убил его и забрал лицо, чтобы носить на себе вместо костюма! Мой брат исчез без следа лунарий назад!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мститель заметно теряет хладнокровие.{/n} "Признайся: ты убил его и забрал лицо, чтобы носить на себе вместо костюма! Мой брат исчез без следа лунарий назад!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Your valet? As if! I never saw my brother again! You hid his face so you could wear it instead of a mask!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
{n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

languages.text: {n}袭击者显然失去了冷静。{/n}“承认了吧！你杀害了我弟弟，夺走了他的脸！这样你就可以戴上他的脸了！我已经一个多月没听说过他的消息了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

traits.locale_text: {n}袭击者显然失去了冷静。{/n}“承认了吧！你杀害了我弟弟，夺走了他的脸！这样你就可以戴上他的脸了！我已经一个多月没听说过他的消息了！”

languages.text: {n}襲撃者は目に見えて冷静さを失った。{/n}「認めろ！お前はあいつを殺して、その顔を奪って着飾るために使っているんだ！俺は弟の消息をずいぶん長い間聞いてない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

traits.locale_text: {n}襲撃者は目に見えて冷静さを失った。{/n}「認めろ！お前はあいつを殺して、その顔を奪って着飾るために使っているんだ！俺は弟の消息をずいぶん長い間聞いてない！」

languages.text: {n}El atacante pierde la compostura.{/n} «¡Admítalo! ¡Lo mató y se quedó su cara para usarla a modo de disfraz! ¡Llevo una luna sin noticias de mi hermano!».
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El atacante pierde la compostura.{/n} «¡Admítalo! ¡Lo mató y se quedó su cara para usarla a modo de disfraz! ¡Llevo una luna sin noticias de mi hermano!».

languages.text: {n}Saldırgan, anında küplere biniyor.{/n} "İtiraf et! Onu sen öldürdün, yüzünü çaldın! Son bir ay döngüsüdür ondan haber alamadım!"
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Saldırgan, anında küplere biniyor.{/n} "İtiraf et! Onu sen öldürdün, yüzünü çaldın! Son bir ay döngüsüdür ondan haber alamadım!"

languages.text: {n}L'assaillant perd visiblement son calme.{/n} « Admettez-le ! Vous l'avez tué afin de pouvoir porter son visage à la place d'un costume ! Ça fait plus d'une lune que mon frère ne m'a pas donné de nouvelles ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'assaillant perd visiblement son calme.{/n} « Admettez-le ! Vous l'avez tué afin de pouvoir porter son visage à la place d'un costume ! Ça fait plus d'une lune que mon frère ne m'a pas donné de nouvelles ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Angreifer verliert sichtlich die Ruhe.{/n} "Gebt es zu. Ihr habt ihn getötet und tragt nun sein Gesicht anstelle eines Kostüms. Ich habe seit einem Mondleben nichts mehr von meinem Bruder gehört!"
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker visibly loses his cool.{/n} "Admit it! You killed him and took his face so you could wear it instead of a costume! I haven't heard from my brother in a moonlife!"
